rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE IN {3387, L6005} Do Must have passed 72 credit points Otherwise true
Must be enrolled in course type {04, 05, 06, 06G, 06PG, 07G, 07PG} owned by {50000567}

description: This unit examines the particular legal issues and problems that arise with respect to the preparation and negotiation of contracts dealing with the licensing of technology and intellectual property. It will provide an overview of the basics of contract law. Students will then consider the specific legal principles that apply to the licensing of various forms of intellectual property.
